title: Number of households in Germany 2000 - 2018 , by size
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 5 lines namely One person, Two persons, Three persons, Four persons, and Five persons and more. The y axis represents Number of households in thousand and the x axis represents Year.
Overall One person, and Two persons are gradually increasing, Three persons, Four persons, and Five persons and more are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, One person mostly maintained the highest Number of households in thousand when compared to others with a mean value of 15645.63, and it peaked at 2018.
After One person, Two persons overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 13524.3, peaking at 2018.
Five persons and more mostly had the least Number of households in thousand with a mean value of 1457.11, which peaked at 2000 with a value of 1665.0.
